resources.string: Congrats username!!! you have energized a 10W bulb for 125 seconds.
Hey, welcome!!! you are one step closer to becoming a green warrior.
Now, your footsteps will generate electricity. This is your opportunity to contribute towards a cleaner world.
You will be creating a cleaner and better world for the next generation. You will also be rewarded with coupons, offers, points and a lot more.
All you have to do is. Just walk, jump, run on Yenveez Floor tiles.
Let\'s start our journey towards a cleaner and better world.
